name: Treeman Begins
description:
Half tree and half man, Treeman must traverse a bizarre world to find his roots. However, due to his limited stamina, he must ensure he is able to root himself to nutrient-rich soil to regain energy.

Keyboard controls:

  • W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move
  • Ctrl or 'down' to crouch
  • Space or 'up' to jump
  • Shift to sprint
  • R to reset
